review: So this is not exactly an Apple TV or a Roku.  It does stream videos from Netflix and Youtube and that's about it for most people.  Once you accept what it is then it's actually not that bad.  You can fire up the videos and still use your phone or tablet to do what you need to do on the side.If you are looking to buy this just be aware that it does not project your tablet/phone.  You simply use your phone/tablet as your remote to fire up the video, and then the Chromecast will take over and stream the video itself.  That's all it does.

review: The Chromecast works very well.  I have a smart tv, but use this as well at home and for travel.  It is simple to use, it syncs with your wireless connection.
